page.title: 14HOUSING:BED'HM:HED'HM
page.content: There are 202 dwellings in this block, 64 in Bedingham,61 in Hedenham & 77 in the part of Woodton included here; 97 are within the Woodton/Bedingham{vil- {lage guideline.}Building outside the planning guideline is allowed in ex- ceptional circumstances only.Hedenham has 12 council-owned dwellings,3 oth- ers having been sold to the occupiers; Woodton has 17 here,Bedingham none but the latter has 21 & Hedenham 23 priv- ate rented or tied cottages.Older dwellings are houses or cottages,main- ly modernised but Bedingham has 3 with no indoor WC & 1 with no bath;Hedenham has 2 with neither.About 50% of dwell- ings have been built since 1945 - 28 are bungalows,11 being council homes for elderly people & many of the more recent are chalet- bungalows -largely infilling, creating the 2 {nucleated villages of Woodton/Bed'hm &Hedenham.
